links.title: Crane Beats
links.description: GAAP earnings per diluted share (EPS) of $0.97 compared to $1.19 in the third quarter of 2019. Excluding Special Items, EPS of $1.05 compared to $1.40 in the third quarter of 2019. Raising and narrowing 2020 GAAP EPS guidance range to $3.10-$3.35 from the prior range of $2.65-$3.45.
